page.title: 13GOVERNMENT: PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: DISTRICT COUNCIL BY THE PARISH COUNCIL. THIS MONEY BEING PUT TOWARDS A NEW VILLAGE HALL PROJECT, TO BE BUILT ON THE PLAYING FIELD. NEW SWINGS HAVE BEEN INSTALLED ON THE PLAYING FIELD AND OTHER MAINTENANCE CARRIED OUT. STREET LIGHTS HAVE BEEN CONVERTED TO COUNTY STANDARD, AND ARE NOW NO LONGER UNDER PARISH COUNCIL CONTROL. OTHER MATTERS UNDER CONSIDERATION ARE: THE PROVISION OF A MULTI-PURPOSE HARD SPORTS AREA AS WELL AS A NEW VILLAGE HALL, AND THE PROVISION OF A STATIC LIBRARY TO REPLACE THE PRESENT MOBILE LIBRARY VAN. EXPERT CLEANERS HAVE CLEANED THE WAR MEMORIAL AND THE WHITE POST OBELISK (JUST OFF THE SURVEY AREA). A KEEP SOMERSHAM TIDY POSTER CAMPAIGN HAS BEEN ORGANISED WITH THE HELP OF SOMERSHAM C.P. SCHOOL.
